You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesE E] > &eogon;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Eogon;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0118/index.htm U+00118].
  * `&eogon;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0119/index.htm U+00119].
